util

The util module is accessible via the sqlobject module.

Attributes

a __package__

None

Modules

The sqlobject.util module exposes 4 submodules:

csvexport
Exports a SQLObject class (possibly annotated) to a CSV file.
csvimport
Import from a CSV file or directory of files.
moduleloader
threadinglocal

See the source for more information.
